texto: J奉9ﾃ
Be careful, Snake. That air lock is set#Nwith infrared sensors.

You probably can't see them with your#Nnaked eyes, but there are infrared#Nbeams coming out of that wall.

texto: p奉9ﾃ
Touch any one of them, and the doors#Nwill seal off and the place will be#Nflooded with poison gas.

texto: P奉9ﾃ
Somehow you've got to get through#Nwithout setting off those sensors.

texto: d奉9ﾃ
I think you might be able to fool the#Ntank's electronic systems with a Chaff#NGrenade.

texto: I奉9ﾃ
You're incredible, Snake! You#Nsinglehandedly beat an M1 tank.
texto_traduzido: Vc eh incrivel, Snake! Derrotou#Num tanque M1 sozinho

texto: !Êr(
No big deal. But I'll bet that VR#Nsimulator you trained on didn't have#Nany scenarios that put you one on one#Nagainst a tank, did it?
texto_traduzido: Sem problemas. Mas aposto q o#Nsimulador VR em q treinou nao tinha#Ncenarios q te colocassem sozinho#Ncontra um tanque, nao eh?

texto: No. But there was no scenario where#NI had to work alone with a special#Nforces soldier against a group of#Nterrorists either.
texto_traduzido: Nao. Mas tbm nao havia cenario#Neu tivesse trabalhar sozinho com#Nsoldado forcas especiais contra#Ngrupo terroristas

texto: f!Ê÷;
In real life, things never go the way#Nyou expect them to...especially on#Na battlefield.

texto: I'm already holed up in the Warhead#NStorage Building. It looks like#NDr. Emmerich is still fine, but I'm not#Nsure for how much longer...

Hurry up this way, okay?

texto: zu0%?
G奉9ﾃ
Deepthroat? No, I don't know anyone#Nwho calls himself that.

texto: I see...

I wonder why he's trying to help you.

Dr. Emmerich is probably being held#Nin his lab in the northeast part of that#Nfloor.

Don't worry. You'll land back on them#Nonce you meet me.

Because you look just like him.

They figured they could help keep it#Nall hush-hush.

I was captured with President Baker#Nright after the revolt started...

texto: Oh yeah.

That's when he gave you detonation#Ncode override keys, right?

Amazing you were able to keep'em#Nhidden from the guards.

Well...women have more hiding places#Nthan men.

No...not that I heard of.

Shooting at targets and shooting at#Nliving, breathing people are different.

texto: Ever since I was a little girl, I always#Ndreamed about being a soldier...

Snake, have you ever heard the#Nsaying "Friendly counsel cuts off many#Nfoes"?

texto: It means that a little bit of advice from#Nfriends can save you a lot of trouble.#NYou should think about it.

texto: If you're in trouble or if you need#Nsome information about something,#Nplease contact Colonel Campbell or#Nsomeone else. Okay?

texto: In my parents' homeland they say "If#Nthere are more wolves, the people are#Neaten; If there are more people, the#Nwolves are eaten."

texto: That means the side with greater#Nnumbers is usually the winner. You're#Nbadly outnumbered Snake...try not to#Nlet them see you.

You'd be surprised how many people#Nsay the same thing.

texto: But I didn't want to kill people. That's#Nwhen I heard that the US Air Force#Nneeded people to do BDAs, battle#Ndamage assessments.
texto_traduzido: Mas nao queria matar pessoas. Foi quando#Nouvi q Forca Aerea EUA#Nprecisava pessoas p/ fazer BDAs#Navaliacoes danos batalha

texto: Those are the guys whose job it is to#Nconfirm how successful a bombing run#Nwas.
texto_traduzido: Sao os caras cujo trabalho eh#Nconfirmar quao bem-sucedido foi#Num bombardeio

texto: rﾗ慨G
Yeah. So I started to do research into#Naerial photography and air#Nintelligence. I made it my major.
texto_traduzido: Sim. Entao comecei a pesquisar#Nfotografia aerea e inteligencia#Naerea. Fiz disso minha especialidade

texto: But there are no pilots who only do#NBDAs...
texto_traduzido: Mas nao ha pilotos q fazem#Napenas BDAs..

texto: aﾗ莞3
That's right. But by the time I learned#Nthat, I was already an expert in my#Nfield.
texto_traduzido: Exato. Mas quando descobri isso#Nja era especialista na minha#Narea

texto: c!Ê÷;
Mei Ling, you said that you wanted#Nto become a pilot. Did you take#Nan aptitude test?
texto_traduzido: Mei Ling, disse q queria#Nse tornar piloto. Fez#Num teste de aptidao?

texto: Well, I've got bad eyes. You probably#Ndidn't know it, but I'm wearing contact#Nlenses.
texto_traduzido: Bem, tenho visao ruim. Provavelmente#Nnao sabia, mas uso lentes#Nde contato

texto: So you failed your aptitude test, huh?
texto_traduzido: Entao reprovou no teste de aptidao ne?

texto: Yeah, it's ridiculous. We're not flying#Naround in biplanes anymore, y'know.
texto_traduzido: Sim, eh ridiculo. Nao voamos mais#Nem biplanos, sabe

texto: That's right. Today's pilots fly jets that#Ngo several times the speed of sound.
texto_traduzido: Exato. Os pilotos de hoje voam jatos#Nque vao varias vezes a velocidade do som

texto: Exactly. At those speeds, the naked#Neye isn't that useful. You need#Nsophisticated electronics to see#Nwhat's really going on.
texto_traduzido: Exatamente. Nessas velocidades, olho nu#Nnao eh tao util. Precisa eletronicos#Nsofisticados p/ ver q#Nrealmente ta acontecendo

texto: So is that why you developed your#Nradar system?
texto_traduzido: Entao foi por isso desenvolveu#No sistema radar?

texto: vﾗ慨G
Yeah. I wanted to develop a radar#Nsystem that would help soldiers make#Nbetter, more informed decisions.
texto_traduzido: Sim. Eu queria desenvolver sistema#Nque ajudasse soldados a tomar#Ndecisoes melhor informadas

texto: So your radar shows what's really#Ngoing on, huh?
texto_traduzido: O seu radar te mosta#No q ta acontecendo, ne?

texto: It depends on how you interpret it.#NLike beauty, truth is in the eye of#Nthe beholder.
texto_traduzido: Depende de como interpreta#NComo a beleza, a verdade ta nos olhos#Nde quem ve

texto: You can say that again.
texto_traduzido: Pode repetir isso

texto: 0ﾗ慨G
Snake, what does it feel like to fight?
texto_traduzido: Snake, como eh a sensacao de lutar?

texto: Why do you ask?
texto_traduzido: Pq pergunta?

texto: I like to play fighting games.
texto_traduzido: Gosto de jogar jogos de luta

texto: Games?
texto_traduzido: Jogos?

texto: ｧﾗ慨G
Yeah. Fighting games. Since I started#Nthis job, I've seen so many people kill#Neach other. But I always see it on#Na monitor, or in burst transmission.
texto_traduzido: Sim. Jogos de luta. Desde q comecei#Neste trabalho, vi tantas pessoas se#Nmatando. Mas sempre vejo numa#Ntela, ou em transmissao rapida

texto: Not a very good job, huh.
texto_traduzido: Trabalho porco, hein

texto: I'm not sure. When you watch it on#Na monitor, it starts to feel just like#Na video game.
texto_traduzido: Nao tenho certeza. Quando assiste#Nnuma tela, comeca a parecer#Num videogame

texto: K!Ê÷;
This is no game! There are no#Nstartovers if you make a mistake.
texto_traduzido: Isso nao eh jogo! Nao ha#Nrecomecos se cometer um erro

texto: I'm sorry...
texto_traduzido: Desculpe..

texto: Z!Ê÷;
Killing's not fun. It's not pretty either,#Nlike it looks in those video games.
texto_traduzido: Matar nao eh divertido. tbm nao eh#Nbonito, como parece nesses videogames

texto: :ﾗ慨G
Okay, Snake...I understand. #NWar's not a game.
texto_traduzido: Ok, Snake..entendo#NGuerra nao eh jogo

texto: o!Ê÷;
Listen, Mei Ling, after this operation is#Nover, I want you to go back to being#Na normal student.
texto_traduzido: Escute, Mei Ling, depois q ta operacao#Nacabar, quero q volte a ser#Numa estudante normal

texto: You should be having fun...playing real#Nvideo games instead of playing war.
texto_traduzido: Deveria divertir..jogando videogames#Nverdade inves brincar guerra

texto: Vﾗ慨G
In China, they say "Rashness brings#Nsuccess to few, misfortune to many."
texto_traduzido: Na China, dizem "Imprudencia traz#Nsucesso a poucos, infortunio a muitos."

texto: Snake, go forward when it's safe, but#Nretreat when there's danger. You'll#Njust have to play it by ear depending#Non the circumstances.
texto_traduzido: Snake, avance quando estiver seguro, mas#Nrecue quando ha perigo. Tera q#Nimprovisar dependendo#Ndas circunstancias

texto: The Chinese say "It is the strong#Nswimmer who most often drowns."
texto_traduzido: O chines diz: O nadador forte#Nquem mais frequentemente se afoga

texto: |ﾗ慨G
It is because the strong swimmer#Noverestimates his abilities and#Nunderestimates the strength of the#Nriver.
texto_traduzido: Eh pq o nadador forte#Nsuperestima suas habilidades e#Nsubestima a forca do#Nrio

texto: You are probably quite used to the#Nmission now, but don't get careless.
texto_traduzido: Provavelmente ja ta bem acostumado#Ncom a missao, mas nao se descuide

texto: There's a Chinese proverb "The mind#Ncannot be in two places at once."
texto_traduzido: Ha proverbio chines "A mente#Nnao pode estar dois lugares mesmo tempo."

texto: Make sure that you're not thinking of#Nsomething else during the mission,#Nokay?
texto_traduzido: Certifique-se de nao estar pensando#Nem outra coisa durante a missao#Nok?

texto: Gather ye rosebuds while ye may,#Nold time is still aflying, and this same#Nflower, that smiles today, tomorrow will#Nbe dying.
texto_traduzido: Colha os botoes de rosa enquanto pode#No tempo velho ainda voa, e ta mesma#Nflor, q sorri hoje, amanha estara#Nmorrendo

texto: /ﾗ慨G
Snake, laughter is the best medicine.
texto_traduzido: Snake, o riso eh o melhor remedio

texto: dﾗ莞3
You should be happy you've got#Nenough free time to play a game.#NEnjoy yourself, okay?
texto_traduzido: Deveria ficar feliz por ter#Ntempo livre suficiente p/ jogar#NSe divirta ok?

texto: In Paradise Lost, Milton wrote#N"Solitude sometimes is best society,#Nand short retirement urges sweet#Nreturn."
texto_traduzido: Em Paraiso Perdido, Milton disse:#NSolidao as vezes eh melhor companhia#Ne curta aposentadoria impele#Nretornos

texto: kﾗ慨G
Is that why you came back, Snake?#NYou got tired of your "short retirement"#Nin Alaska, huh?
texto_traduzido: Foi por isso q voltou, Snake?#NSe cansou de sua "curta aposentadoria"#Nno Alasca, ne?

texto: The proud man does not eat rotting#Nmeat even when hungry, nor steal#Nwater from another's well when he#Nthirsts.
texto_traduzido: O homem orgulhoso nao come carne#Npodre mesmo com fome, nem rouba#Nagua do poco alheio quando#Ntem sede

texto: But...on the other hand, you were#Nforced to steal or find every item#Nyou've got, so I guess I shouldn't say#Nthat.
texto_traduzido: Mas..por outro lado, foi forcado#Na roubar ou encontrar cada item#Nque tem, entao acho q nao deveria#Ndizer isso

texto: In China, they say "Once the fox gets#Nhis nose in, he'll soon find a way to#Nmake his body follow."
texto_traduzido: Na China, dizem "Uma vez q a raposa#Nmete o nariz, logo encontra uma forma#Nde fazer o corpo seguir."

texto: That's a perfect description of you.#NYou can do it, Snake. But you've got#Nto be flexible...adapt to each situation#Nuniquely.
texto_traduzido: Eh uma descricao perfeita de vc#Nvc consegue, Snake. Mas tem q#Nser flexivel..adapte-se a cada situacao#Nde forma unica

texto: He who is firm in will molds the world#Nto himself.
texto_traduzido: Aquele q eh firme na vontade molda#No mundo a si..

texto: Don't forget what you're here to do.#NYou've got to seize any opportunities#Nthat present themselves.
texto_traduzido: Nao esqueca o q veio fazer aqui#NTem q aproveitar qualquer oportunidade#Nque se apresente

texto: <ﾗ莞3
But I guess I don't have to tell you#Nthat, do I?
texto_traduzido: Mas acho q nao preciso te dizer#Nisso, nao eh?

texto: 9ﾗ慨G
Don't forget to save your memories of#Nme too.
texto_traduzido: N esqueca de salvar suas lembrancas#Nde mim tbm

texto: You can't save memories even on that#Nsystem of yours. Memories are fragile#Nthings.
texto_traduzido: Nao pode salvar lembrancas mesmo nesse#Nseu sistema. Lembrancas sao coisas#Nfrageis

texto: After you reduce them to binary#Nnumbers and send them through the#Nair, they're not memories anymore.
texto_traduzido: Depois q as reduz a numeros#Nbinarios e as envia pelo#Nar, nao sao mais lembrancas

texto: I wouldn't be so sure of that. There's#Nnothing that my systems can't do.
texto_traduzido: Nao teria certeza disso. Nao#Nha nada q meus nao sistemas possam fazer

texto: z!Ê÷;
Memories aren't just sounds and#Npictures. They exist somewhere#Nbetween the sounds, between#Nthe pictures.
texto_traduzido: Lembrancas nao sao apenas sons e#Nimagens. Elas existem em algum lugar#Nentre os sons, entre#Nas imagens

texto: I don't get it. Anything can be done#Ndigitally.
texto_traduzido: Nao entendo. Tudo pode ser feito#Ndigitalmente

texto: b!Ê÷;
If that's true, why don't you go ahead#Nand try to save what I'm thinking right#Nnow.
texto_traduzido: Se isso eh verdade, pq nao vai#Nem frente e tenta salvar o q estou#Npensando agora

texto: I can't save that type of thing. You#Nhave to put it into words at least...
texto_traduzido: Nao posso salvar esse tipo de coisa#NTem q colocar em palavras pelo menos

texto: That's right. And that's what memories#Nare...wordless.

texto: #ﾗ慨G
I don't know about that...
texto_traduzido: Nao sei sobre isso..

texto: m!Ê÷;
No matter how far data technology#Nadvances, you'll never be able to#Npenetrate the human heart.
texto_traduzido: Nao importa o quanto a tecnologia de dados#Navance, nunca conseguira#Npenetrar o coracao humano

texto: 4ﾗ慨G
You're wrong. It's just a matter of time...
texto_traduzido: Vc ta errado. Eh so questao de tempo..

texto: But first you have to try to understand#Nhuman emotions, Mei Ling.
texto_traduzido: Mas primeiro tem q tentar entender#Nas emocoes humanas, Mei Ling

texto: And how do I do that?
texto_traduzido: E como faco isso?

texto: You have to allow yourself to fall in#Nlove with someone.
texto_traduzido: Tem q se permitir se apaixonar#Npor alguem

texto: jﾗ慨G
Snake, in China they say "When#Nwalking through a melon patch, don't#Nadjust your sandals."
texto_traduzido: Snake, na China dizem "Quando#Ncaminhar por um campo de meloes, nao#Najuste suas sandalias."

texto: That means that when things get#Nreally bad, you have to try to#Nremember what's important.
texto_traduzido: Isso significa q quando tudo piorar, vc tem q#Nlembrar o q realmente importa

texto: 8ﾗ慨G
Keep things in the proper#Nperspective, okay?

texto: Nﾗ慨G
In China, they say "The snake,#Nknowing itself, strikes swiftly."
texto_traduzido: Na China dizem: A cobra#Nconhecendo a si mesma, ataca rapidamente

texto: It means that if you have confidence#Nthat what you are doing is part of your#Ntrue nature, there should be no#Nhesitation.
texto_traduzido: Significa q se tem confianca#Nde q o q ta fazendo faz parte#Nda sua verdadeira natureza, nao deveria#Nhaver hesitacao

texto: I don't know whether your orders are#Nin your true nature or not. But Snake...#Nbelieve in yourself!
texto_traduzido: Nao sei se suas ordens estao#Nna sua verdadeira natureza ou nao. Mas Snake#Nacredite em si mesmo!

texto: Tﾗ慨G
Snake, Leo Durocher said "Win any#Nway you can. Nice guys finish last."

texto: What about you, Snake? Is that what#Nyou think? Is there anything that you#Nwouldn't do to stay alive?

texto: ,ﾗ慨G
You should think about that, Snake.

texto: Snake, don't give up. Remember#NMacbeth, act V, scene 3.

texto: I'll fight, till from my bones my flesh#Nbe hack'd, give me my armor.

texto: Fﾗ慨G
Everyone is counting on you,#NSnake....You've got to do it!

War he sung, is toil and trouble;#Nhonor but an empty bubble.

What about you, Snake? Is your honor#Njust an empty bubble, too?

texto: ^ﾗ慨G
Snake,"Come, what come may, time#Nand the hour runs through the#Nroughest day."

We're almost out of time, Snake.

Please hurry! You're the only one who#Ncan stop them from launching that#Nnuke.

How do I love thee? Let me count#Nthe ways...

texto: Oh uh...don't think too deeply about#Nthat one. I'm not sure why I said it...

Talk to you later, Snake.

C'mon, Snake. Don't call me for no#Nreason.

Look at the radar! It's picking up the#NDARPA chief. He's the green dot.#NHurry and rescue him.
texto_traduzido: Olhe o radar! ta captando o#Nchefe da DARPA. Ele eh o ponto verde#NSe apresse e o resgate

texto: ､ﾗ慨G
Snake, you can't use your radar in that#Narea. There's some kind of electronic#Njamming coming from there...I wonder#Nwhat it is. Anyway, be careful.
texto_traduzido: Snake, nao pode usar seu radar naquela#Narea. Ha algum tipo de interferencia#Neletronica vindo de la..me pergunto#No q eh. De qualquer forma, cuidado

texto: Yﾗ慨G
The DARPA Chief. Poor man...he has a#Nheart attack right after you save him...
texto_traduzido: O Chefe da DARPA. Pobre homem..teve um#Nataque cardiaco logo depois q o salvou

texto: I'm getting a bad feeling about this,#NSnake. Maybe you should let me save#Nyour mission.

Snake, you can't use the radar#Nbecause something's jamming it.

texto: And whatever's doing it is very close#Nto you. Be careful!

texto: Snake, you can't use your radar. #NIt's confused by all of the radio#Ninterference. That ninja is giving off#Nsome kind of electrical energy!

Snake! That's a ladies bathroom!

texto: I know that. I saw Meryl come in here.

So you went in after her!? Are you#Nsome kind of pervert!? I won't let you#Nsave your mission now!

texto: Listen Mei Ling, this is the only place#Non this base that I can talk to Meryl#Nalone!

Whatever, weirdo! Don't call me again!

She'll die if you leave her like that!#NAren't you going to save her!?

I'm hoping that as long as I don't fall#Nfor it, they'll leave Meryl alive.

I know. I can't use it in a narrow space#Nlike this, right?

texto: Right. I'm sorry.

No reason to apologize. Even the#Ngreatest masterpiece has its flaws.

Mei Ling, how can someone outside#Nof this operation cut into my Codec?

texto: You're talking about that guy calling#Nhimself Deepthroat. We were#Nmonitoring from here.

texto: What about it?

texto: Well, if somebody knows your#Nfrequency, they can call you. But the#Nquestion is how did he learn it.#N...it's top secret information...

texto: Snake, there's an old Chinese saying#N"A scholar who cherishes the love of#Ncomfort is not fit to be deemed a#Nscholar."

texto: gﾗ慨G
Einstein said it another way. He said#Nthat only a life lived for others is worth#Nliving.

texto: That's why I entered MIT instead of#NPrinceton or Vassar like my friends.

texto: nﾗ慨G

texto: FoxDie is a type of retrovirus that#Ntargets and kills only specific people.
texto_traduzido: FoxDie eh um tipo de retrovirus q#Nmira e mata apenas pessoas especificas

texto: First, it infects the macrophages in the#Nvictim's body.

texto: FoxDie contains "smart" enzymes,#Ncreated through protein engineering.
texto_traduzido: FoxDie contem enzimas inteligentes#Nfeitas por engenharia proteica

texto: They're programmed to respond to#Nspecific genetic patterns in the cells.

texto: Those enzymes recognize the target's#NDNA?

texto: Right. They respond by becoming #Nactive, and using the macrophages,#Nthey begin creating TNF epsilon.
texto_traduzido: Certo. Respondem se tornando #Nativas, e usando os macrofagos#Ncomecam a criar TNF epsilon

texto: It's a type of cytokine, a peptide#Nwhich causes cells to die.
texto_traduzido: Eh um tipo de citocina, um peptideo#Nque causa morte celular

texto: The TNF epsilon is carried along the#Nbloodstream to the heart, where they#Nattach to the TNF receptors in the#Nheart cells.

texto: And then...they cause a heart attack?

texto: Snake, there are some places on the#Nwall where steam from the heating#Nsystem is spurting out. So be careful,#Nit'll give you a nasty burn.

If you stick close to those steps,#NI think you can make it to the other#Nside...probably.

texto: There's a cargo elevator in the#Nnortheast part of the bottom floor.#NYou can take that to Metal Gear's#Nunderground base.

texto: ...I'll be watching, Snake...

texto: That room is still under construction#Nbecause their main priority was to#Nfinish Metal Gear's underground base.

texto: b=,ｭ]
But the good thing is, with all those#Ncontainers, it should be easy to hide,#Nright?

texto: S=,ｭ]
I don't know anything about Dr. Naomi,#Nso there's not much I can say...

texto: But, Snake, I think you'd better leave#Nthat to Colonel Campbell. Don't you#Nthink you'd better just get to the#NControl Room.

texto: C=,ｭ]
That's where the emergency PAL#Ncode override system is.

texto: G=,ｭ]
The Control Room is on the 3rd floor#Nof the base you're in.

texto: Do you see that ladder next to#NMetal Gear?

texto: You can climb up there.

texto: Otacon. How's it going?
texto_traduzido: Otacon. Como ta indo?

texto: Not yet. Give me a little more time.

texto: Got it yet?

texto: Please, Snake, give me a little more#Ntime.
texto_traduzido: Por favor Snake me de mais#Ntempo

texto: How about it? Did you find#Nthe override system file?
texto_traduzido: E ai? Encontrou o arquivo do#Nsistema de sobrescrita?

texto: Not yet. I need a little more time.

texto: Well, I found lots of information about#Nthat new nuclear weapon...
texto_traduzido: Bem, achei muitas informacoes sobre#Nessa nova arma nuclear..

texto: o=,ｭ]
There are 4 stages involved in#Nlaunching a ballistic missile. #NThe first one is the Boost Stage.
texto_traduzido: Ha 4 estagios envolvidos no#Nlancamento de um missil balistico#NO primeiro eh o Estagio de Impulso

texto: It starts at the point the missile is#Nlaunched and ends after all the rocket#Nfuel is burned and the missile is#Npropelled into the exosphere.
texto_traduzido: Comeca no ponto q o missil eh#Nlancado e termina apos todo o#Ncombustivel ser queimado e o missil#Nser impulsionado p/ a exosfera

texto: The next stage is the Post-Boost#NStage. It starts after all the fuel is#Nburned and ends after the re-entry#Nvehicle is ejected.
texto_traduzido: O proximo estagio eh o Pos-Impulso#NComeca apos todo combustivel ser#Nqueimado e termina apos o veiculo#Nde reentrada ser ejetado

texto: Next is the Intermediate Course#NStage. It takes place after the#Nre-entry vehicle is ejected and lasts#Nuntil the missile enters the exosphere.
texto_traduzido: Seguinte eh o Estagio de Curso#NIntermediario. Ocorre apos o veiculo#Nde reentrada ser ejetado e dura#Nate o missil entrar na exosfera

texto: ｧ=,ｭ]
Then comes the Final Stage. It starts#Nwhen the re-entry vehicle enters the#Nexosphere and it lasts until it reaches#Nits ultimate target on the ground.
texto_traduzido: Entao vem o Estagio Final. Comeca#Nquando o veiculo de reentrada entra#Nna exosfera e dura ate alcancar#Nseu alvo final no solo

texto: Missile defense systems use military#Nsatellites to detect rocket emissions#Nduring the initial Boost Stage of#Na missile.
texto_traduzido: Sistemas de anti-misseis usam#Nsatelites militares p/ detectar#Nemissoes de foguete durante o#NEstagio de Impulso inicial

texto: But this new nuclear weapon employs#Nthe rail gun's ability to fire projectiles#Nat ultra-high velocities, instead of#Nusing a rocket.
texto_traduzido: Mas essa nova arma nuclear usa#Na habilidade da arma rail de disparar#Nprojeteis em velocidades ultra-altas#Nao inves de usar foguete

texto: That's why it can't be detected by#Ntoday's missile defense systems!
texto_traduzido: Por isso nao pode ser detectado#Npelos sistemas de defesa atuais!

texto: And on top of that, the re-entry#Nvehicle also uses Stealth technology...
texto_traduzido: E alem disso, o veiculo de reentrada#Ntbm usa tecnologia Stealth..

texto: It's so accurate that its fifty percent#Nzone comes close to 50 meters. #NThat's as good as the best ICBM.
texto_traduzido: Eh tao preciso q sua zona de#Ncinquenta por cento chega perto#Nde 50 metros. Tao bom quanto o melhor ICBM

texto: A highly accurate, undetectable,#Nuninterceptable nuclear weapon.#NWe wouldn't even be able to tell#Nwhere it came from...
texto_traduzido: Uma arma nuclear altamente precisa#Nindetectavel, ininterceptavel#NNem conseguiriamos dizer de#Nonde veio..

texto: And that's not all. A standard ballistic#Nmissile uses a 2-stage or a 3-stage#Nsolid fuel rocket for its propulsion#Nsystem.
texto_traduzido: E nao eh so isso. Um missil balistico#Nusa foguete de combustivel#Nsolido de 2 ou 3 estagios p/#Nseu sistema de propulsao

texto: Besides costing lots of money, safely#Nmaintaining the solid rocket fuel and#Nreadying the missile for launch#Nrequires a lot of work.
texto_traduzido: Alem de custar muito dinheiro#Nmanter com seguranca o combustivel#Nsolido e preparar o missil p/#Nlancamento requer muito trabalho

texto: But a railgun-launched nuclear#Nwarhead avoids all of those#Nproblems. And it's cheap too.
texto_traduzido: Mas uma ogiva nuclear lancada por#Nrail gun evita todos esses#Nproblemas. E eh barata tbm

texto: It's the perfect nuke. A general's#Ndream...
texto_traduzido: Eh a bomba perfeita. O sonho#Nde um general..

texto: And the world's nightmare.
texto_traduzido: E o pesadelo do mundo

texto: Did you find the file for the override#Nsystem?
texto_traduzido: Encontrou o arquivo do sistema#Nde sobrescrita?

texto: Just wait a little longer.
texto_traduzido: So espere mais um pouco

texto: I found out a lot about the arms#Nindustry though...
texto_traduzido: Descobri muito sobre a industria#Nbelica..

texto: After the Cold War ended, the United#NStates slashed its defense budget by#Nmore than 15%. Naturally, the arms#Nindustry was severely affected.
texto_traduzido: Apos o fim da Guerra Fria os Estados#NUnidos cortaram o orcamento de defesa#Nem mais de 15%. Assim a#Nindustria belica foi severamente afetada

texto: It resulted in an orgy of mergers and#Nacquisitions.
texto_traduzido: Resultou numa orgia de fusoes#Ne aquisicoes

texto: Some of the big arms conglomerates#Ntoday are made up of what 10 years#Nago would have been 20 or more#Nsmaller arms companies.
texto_traduzido: Alguns dos grandes conglomerados#Nbelicos hoje sao formados pelo q#N10 anos atras seriam 20 ou mais#Npequ empresas de armas

texto: ArmsTech is one of those. But we lost#Nour bid to produce the US Air Force's#Nnext line of fighter jets.
texto_traduzido: ArmsTech eh dessas. Mas perdemos#Na licitacao produzir proxima#Nlinha cacas Forca Aerea EUA

texto: Then we took a stab at civilian#Napplications, but that was a failure too.#NThe company was about to go belly#Nup.
texto_traduzido: Entao tentamos aplicacoes civis#Nmas isso tbm falhou. A empresa#Nestava prestes a ir a falencia

texto: Ironically, the Defense Department#Nwas in pretty much the same situation.
texto_traduzido: Ironicamente, o Departamento de#NDefesa estava na mesma situacao

texto: Thanks to big budget cuts, they were#Nforced to turn to the private sector to#Nhelp fund their weapons development.
texto_traduzido: Devido grandes cortes orcamento#Nforam forcados recorrer setor#Nprivado financiar desenvolvimento armas

texto: On top of that, the government began#Nto actively export their advanced#Nweapons technology to the private#Nsector...
texto_traduzido: Alem disso, o governo comecou a#Nexportar ativamente sua tecnologia#Navancada de armas p/ o setor#Nprivado..

texto: ...in order to maintain a high standard#Nof quality in the country's defense#Narmaments.
texto_traduzido: ..para manter um alto padrao de#Nqualidade nos armamentos de#Ndefesa do pais

texto: Eventually they decided on a joint#Ndevelopment project for new weapon#Nsystems between the DOD and the#Nprivate sector.
texto_traduzido: Eventualmente decidiram por um#Nprojeto em conjunto#Nde novos sistemas de armas entre#No DOD e o setor privado

texto: And...since both sides were in such#Nbad financial shape, that's where all#Nthe backscratching came in.
texto_traduzido: E.. como ambos os lados estavam#Nem situacao financeira ruim, foi ai#Nque entraram os favores mutuos

texto: So there was another reason for the#Njoint development of Metal Gear, huh.#NIt wasn't just President Baker trying to#Nkeep ArmsTech afloat...
texto_traduzido: Entao havia outro motivo p/ o#Ndesenvolvimento conjunto do Metal Gear#NNao era so o Presidente Baker tentando#Nmanter a ArmsTech funcionando..

texto: The terrorists are finished inputting#Nthe detonation codes!
texto_traduzido: Os terroristas terminaram de inserir#No codigo de detonacao!

texto: The only way to stop the launch now is#Nto re-input the detonation codes to#Nlock the detonation mechanism. You#Nneed that key to do it.

Snake, the card key changed shape.#NYou've got to change it back to room#Ntemperature!

Snake, it looks like you changed #Nthe card key's shape correctly.

That place is right in the middle of the#Npermafrost layer and there's no heater#Neither.

texto: But be careful. If you're in a cold#Nplace for too long, it'll change back#Nto its original shape.#NYou need to hurry.

Snake, leave it to Colonel Campbell.#NYou've got to concentrate on#Nre-inputting that detonation code.

texto: My name, my father, my grandfather.#N...It felt like all those things were a#Nball and chain around my legs,#Ndragging me down..

texto: But now that I think about it, #NI realize that I was blessed.

texto: That's not the right shape. Hurry and#Nwarm it up. The blast furnace is#Nprobably the best place.

texto: Snake, Rex's armor is impregnable.#NYou can't do any damage with the#Nweapons you've got.

The only way you can pierce it is#Nwith a high performance HEAT (high#Nexplosive, anti-tank) round.

texto: So what do I do?

texto: Rex's pilot seat operates exactly like#Na VR system.
texto_traduzido: O assento piloto do Rex opera#Ncomo num sistema VR

texto: It's got multiple sensors connected#Nto a high tech interface used for#Nthe controls.

texto: It's completely self-enclosed and #Nshut off from the outside environment.
texto_traduzido: Eh completamente fechado e#Nisolado do ambiente externo

texto: He's not using his naked eyes?

texto: That's right. So if you could somehow#Ndestroy the sensors...
texto_traduzido: Exato! Entao se vc pudesse#Ndestruir os sensores..

texto: Do you see that round plate on #NRex's left arm?

texto: Yeah, that thing that looks like#Na shield?

texto: That's a radome. If you can destroy#Nthat thing, it won't be able to use its#Nelectronic equipment.

texto: So he'll be blinded?

texto: So that will stop it?

texto: Oh great.

texto: The part that looks like a beak#Nis where the pilot seat is. In an#Nemergency it will open up.

texto: Right. If you can shoot a Stinger#Nmissile into the cockpit, you'll destroy#Nthe computer control system.

texto: You intentionally designed it with#Na weak point?

I guess so. I owe you one, Otacon.

texto: It's a laser weapon that discharges#Na laser beam into an electron beam#Nthat's been accelerated using giant#Nmagnets.

texto: It can generate an incredible#Namount of energy...pretty close to 100#Nmegawatts. That's ten times greater#Nthan any other laser out there.
texto_traduzido: Pode gerar uma quantidade incrivel#Nde energia.. perto de 100 megawatts#NIsso eh dez vezes maior q qualquer#Noutro laser por ai

texto: First use a Stinger missile to destroy#Nthe radome and disable its electronics.

texto: Rex is equipped with anti-tank#Nmissiles on both of his knees.#NThey're a laser semi-active homing#Ntype that doesn't use wires.
texto_traduzido: Rex ta equipado com misseis#Nanti-tanque em ambos os joelhos#NSao do tipo guiado semi-ativo a laser#Nque nao usa fios

texto: After that, the missile uses the light#Nreflected off the target to home in#Non it.

texto: Fortunately, the missiles are tipped#Nwith HEAT rounds and not anti-#Npersonnel warheads. But if they hit#Nyou directly, you'll be sorry. Be careful.

texto: The rail gun uses magnetism to fire#Nprojectiles.

texto: By perfecting the process of shell#Nacceleration, the railgun is able to fire#Na projectile with a muzzle velocity of#Nover 100 kilometers per second.

texto: It was originally going to be used, #Nas part of SDI, to shoot down enemy#NICBMs outside the atmosphere.

texto: It's ironic that now it's going to be#Nused to deliver a nuclear warhead...

texto: They pop it into a VR simulation while#Nit's still in the design phase.

texto: That way they can make#Nimprovements to the design while#Ntesting it under all sorts of simulated#Nconditions.

texto: So even though it's a prototype, #Nit's extremely well-designed. #NBe careful!

Those are wolf dogs in there. Just like#Ntheir name, they're a cross between#Nhuskies and Alaskan wolves. They#Nwere bred to be used as sled dogs.

texto: But they didn't get the stamina and#Npower they were hoping for.

texto: On top of that, their personalities#Nwound up closer to wolves. Most of#Nthem won't even let you get close.#NThat's why they never caught on.

texto: Some say that ravens have the power#Nto predict death. The great poet#NMarlowe wrote about them in the 16th#Ncentury.

texto: il"愨
"Thus like the sad presaging raven#Nthat tolls the sick man's passport in#Nher hollow beak,

texto: And in the shadow of the silent night#Ndoth shake contagion from her sable#Nwings."

texto: That's pretty gloomy, Master.

It seems dirty to us, but that's what#Nallows them to live even in a climate#Nlike this.

texto: Legends say that crows have three#Ntimes the life span of a man, and that#Nravens have three times the life span#Nof a crow.

That's just an old wives' tale, but it's#Ntrue that crows live longer than many#Ntypes of birds. Northern Ravens can#Nlive pretty close to 70 years.

texto: That place is right in the middle of #Nthe permafrost. Just like the name says, #Nit never melts. I've heard over 85% of#NAlaska is permafrost.

First you have to change the shape of#Nthe last key.
texto_traduzido: Primeiro vc tem q mudar a forma#Nda ultima chave

texto: z¢z0
War brings out the cruelty of man. #NNo matter how the soldier was brought#Nup, they all turn into animals when#Nthey thrust into the heat of combat.
texto_traduzido: A guerra traz a tona a crueldade do#Nhomem. Nao importa como o soldado#Nfoi criado, todos se tornam animais#Nquando empurrados p/ o calor do combate

texto: Sometimes, even though you know #Nit's a losing battle, you just have to fight#Nor be damned. A narrow chance is still#Na chance.
texto_traduzido: As vezes, mesmo sabendo eh#Nbatalha perdida, vc so tem#Nlutar ou condenado. Chance#Nestreita ainda chance

texto: On top of that, he wasn't using burst#Ntransmission. It seems he was#Ntransmitting from somewhere on this#Nbase.
texto_traduzido: Alem disso, nao estava usando#Ntransmissao em rajada. Parece q#Nestava transmitindo de algum lugar#Nnesta base

texto: Somewhere on the base?
texto_traduzido: Algum lugar na base?

texto: ...I have no idea who that could be.
texto_traduzido: ..Nao faco ideia de quem possa ser

texto: He's just playing with you. Why don't#Nyou try throwing away your weapons?
texto_traduzido: Ele ta so brincando com vc#NPq nao tenta jogar fora suas armas?

texto: You managed to link up with Meryl.#NGood...So now you must have the card#Nkeys that will override the detonation#Ncode.
texto_traduzido: Conseguiu se encontrar com a Meryl#NBom.. Entao agora deve ter as#Nchaves q vao sobrescrever#No codigo de detonacao

texto: You should hurry, the time limit is#Nrunning out.
texto_traduzido: Deveria se apressar o limite de#Ntempo ta acabando

texto: Meryl's just being controlled. You're#Nan expert at unarmed CQB (Close#NQuarters Battle), right? Stop her#Nwithout using your gun, that's all.
texto_traduzido: Meryl ta apenas sendo controlada#Nvc eh expert em CQC (Combate#NCorpo a Corpo) desarmado, certo?#NPare-a sem usar sua arma, so isso

texto: ^l"愨
Meryl must have somehow been#Nbrainwashed. There should be some#Nway to help her.
texto_traduzido: Meryl deve ter sofrido lavagem#Ncerebral. Deve ter alguma#Nforma ajuda-la

texto: El"愨
ÐÐ Ð#NÐ
D:D50
､l"愨
People who have been through war#Nand survived develop a kind of sixth#Nsense to warn them of danger. Trust#Nyour instincts as a soldier, as a gamer.
texto_traduzido: Pessoas q passaram pela guerra#Ne sobreviveram desenvolvem#N um sexto sentido p/ alertar #Nperigos. Confie nos seus instintos de soldado

texto: In war, a split second can mean the#Ndifference between victory and#Ndefeat. Don't ever hesitate.
texto_traduzido: Na guerra, uma fracao de segundo#Npode significar a diferenca entre#Nvitoria e derrota. Nao hesite

texto: Ol"愨
The slower you react, the greater the#Nchance that you'll be beaten.
texto_traduzido: Quanto mais devagar reagir, maior#Na chance de ser derrotado

texto: That inner voice that warns you when#Ndanger is nearby...you can't learn that#Nin training.
texto_traduzido: Aquela voz interior q te avisa do#Nperigo por perto.. nao#Nse aprende em treinamentos

texto: You've got to have survived a few#Nfirefights...seen a few friends blown#Naway before you learn that trick.
texto_traduzido: Vc tem q sobrevivido a alguns#Ntiroteios.. visto alguns amigos serem#Nmortos antes de aprender esse truque

texto: When you're trying to hide, avoid#Nplaces that look like the enemy might#Nsearch.
texto_traduzido: Se for se esconder, evita lugares#Nonde o inimigo buscaria

texto: Think about how your enemy is going#Nto move and then sneak in there. #NIt doesn't matter how smart you#Nare, just use your head out there.
texto_traduzido: Pense sobre como seu inimigo vai#Nse mover e entao se infiltre la#NNao importa o quao inteligente vc#Neh, apenas use a cabeca por ai

texto: Snake, divide and conquer. Try to#Ntake your enemies on one at a time.
texto_traduzido: Snake divida e conquiste.Tente#Nenfrentar seus inimigos um de cada vez

Psycho Mantis...what a pathetic man.#NHe was born with all the right tools,#Nbut he never knew how to use them...
texto_traduzido: Psycho Mantis.. q homem patetico#NNasceu com todas as ferramentas#Ncertas, mas nunca soube como usa-las..

texto: ^M^H0
Foresight is important in war. In times#Nof extreme danger, people's latent#Nsixth sense often awakens.
texto_traduzido: Previsao importante guerra. Em#Nmomentos perigo extremo, sexto#Nsentido latente pessoas desperta

texto: When that happens, throw logic to the#Nwind and trust your instincts.
texto_traduzido: Quando acontece, jogue logica#Nao vento confie instintos

texto: The only way to conquer fear is to#Nstare it straight in the face and laugh#Nat it. Never let fear control you.
texto_traduzido: A unica forma de conquistar o medo#Neh encara-lo direto na cara e rir#Ndele. Nunca deixe o medo te controlar

texto: Don't feel guilty about the soldiers#Nthat died from your bullets. They knew#Nthe risks they were taking, just like#Nyou.
texto_traduzido: Nao se sinta culpado pelos soldados#Nque morreram das suas balas. Eles#Nsabiam os riscos q estavam correndo#Ncomo vc

texto: 2Q02L
vr01
Snake, what happened to your items?#NYou're not going to try to finish this#Nmission barehanded are you? Get#Nyour items.
texto_traduzido: Snake, o q aconteceu com seus itens?#NNao vai tentar terminar essa missao#Nde maos vazias, vai? Pegue seus itens

texto: Now that you've got your stuff back,#Nyou should take a good look through#Nit. If you're slow equipping an item in#Nbattle, it could mean death.
texto_traduzido: Agora q recuperou suas coisas#Ndeveria dar uma boa olhada nelas#NSe for lento equipando um item em#Nbatalha, pode significar morte

texto: Sound travels better in cold #Nenvironments. If you're going to #Nuse a handgun, you should equip #Na suppressor.
texto_traduzido: Som viaja melhor em ambientes#Nfrios. Se vai usar uma pistola#Ndeveria equipar um silenciador

texto: ｢l"愨
When the temperature falls down to#Nminus 30 or minus 40 degrees celsius,#Nyou start to get ice fogs. That's when#Nthe moisture in the air freezes.
texto_traduzido: Quando a temperatura cai p/ menos#N30 ou menos 40 graus celsius, comecam#Nas nevoas de gelo. Eh quando a#Numidade do ar congela

texto: It may look pretty at first, but it'll#Nseverely limit your visibility. Be careful.
texto_traduzido: Pode parecer bonito no inicio, mas#Nvai limitar sua visibilidade#NCuidado

texto: Kipling, an English poet who also won#Nthe Nobel prize, said that once you go#Nbeyond 65 north,
texto_traduzido: Kipling, poeta ingles tbm#Nganhou premio Nobel, disse q#Numa vez vc vai alem 65 norte,

texto: you're beyond the reach of divine#Nprotection and human law.
texto_traduzido: Vc ta alem do alcance da#Nprotecao divina e lei humana

texto: To survive in such surroundings, you#Nhave to be strong enough to not rely#Non God or anyone else.
texto_traduzido: Para sobreviver em tais ambientes#Nvc tem q ser forte#Npara nao depender Deus

texto: In cold like this, over 70% of your body#Nwarmth is lost through your head. Put#Non some kind of hat.
texto_traduzido: No frio assim, mais de 70% do calor#Ndo seu corpo eh perdido pela cabeca#NColoque algum tipo de chapeu

texto: I hate hats. Is a bandanna okay?
texto_traduzido: Odeio chapeus Uma bandana serve?

texto: 2l"愨
Well, I guess it's better than nothing...
texto_traduzido: Bem, acho q eh melhor q nada..

texto: In an arctic environment, it's important#Nto change your underwear if you're#Nsweating a lot. Dawdle around too#Nmuch and you'll not only waste your
texto_traduzido: Num ambiente artico, eh importante#Ntrocar sua roupa intima se estiver#Nsuando muito. Demore demais e nao#Nso desperdicara sua

texto: strength, but you could even catch#Npneumonia. Gaming after a bath#Nshould be avoided.
texto_traduzido: energia, mas pode ate pegar pneumonia#NJogar depois do banho deve#Nser evitado

texto: It's easy to dehydrate in sub-zero#Nclimates, so make sure to replenish#Nyour fluids. But don't ever try to do it#Nby eating snow.
texto_traduzido: Eh facil desidratar em climas abaixo#Nde zero, entao certifique-se de#Nrepor seus fluidos. Mas nunca tente#Nfazer isso comendo neve

texto: You'll freeze your stomach and your#Nbody temperature will drop. Always#Nmelt the snow and then boil it before#Nyou drink it.
texto_traduzido: Vai congelar seu estomago e sua#Ntemperatura corporal vai cair. Sempre#Nderreta a neve e entao ferva antes#Nde beber

texto: No cold foods or cold liquids for you.#NThat stuff causes a temperature#Nimbalance that actually drains your#Nbody of energy.
texto_traduzido: Nada de comidas ou liquidos frios#Npara vc. Essas coisas causam#Ndesequilibrio de temperatura q#Ndrena energia do seu corpo

texto: .l"愨
A golden rule in arctic environments.
texto_traduzido: Uma lei de ouro em ambientes articos

texto: Don't suddenly look into the dark.#NLook slowly from a light area to a#Ndarker area.
texto_traduzido: Nao olhe subitamente escuro#NOlhe devagar de area clara#Npara area mais escura

texto: If you do that, your eyes will gradually#Nadjust and you'll be able to see better#Nin the dark. Try not to play in the dark#Neither.
texto_traduzido: Se fizer isso, seus olhos gradualmente#Nse ajustarao e conseguira ver melhor#Nno escuro. Tente nao jogar no escuro#Ntbm

texto: When you're fighting in the dark, #Nyou need to use your sense of hearing#Nand smell. Don't trust your eyes, #Nuse your ears.
texto_traduzido: Quando estiver lutando no escuro#Nprecisa usar seu sentido de audicao#Ne olfato. Nao confie nos seus olhos#Nuse seus ouvidos

texto: Feel the flow of the air with your#Nwhole body. That's the way to tell#Nwhere your enemy is.
texto_traduzido: Sinta o fluxo do ar com todo seu#Ncorpo. Eh a forma de saber onde#Nseu inimigo esta

texto: Al"愨
People sometimes panic in the dark.#NTry to stay cool.
texto_traduzido: As vezes pessoas surtam#Nno escuro. Fique calma

texto: When you're wearing Night-Vision#NGoggles, the light gets amplified a#Nhundred-fold.
texto_traduzido: Quando ta usando Oculos de Visao#NNoturna, a luz eh amplificada#Ncem vezes

texto: So if you look at an explosion or a#NStun Grenade, you may burn your#Nretinas. If that happens, it'll take a#Nlittle while until your vision returns.
texto_traduzido: Entao se olhar p/ uma explosao ou#Numa Granada Atordoante, pode queimar#Nsuas retinas. Se isso acontecer, vai#Ndemorar um pouco ate sua visao voltar

texto: tqtl0
You're as good as ever, Snake. Not#Nonly are you an expert at infiltration,#Nbut you're a skilled marksman too.
texto_traduzido: Vc ta tao bom quanto sempre#NSnake. Nao so eh expert em infiltracao#Nmas tbm um sniper habilidoso

texto: But never relax until you confirm a kill#Nwith your own two eyes.
texto_traduzido: Mas nunca relaxe ate confirmar uma#Nmorte com seus proprios olhos

texto: The most important tools you need to#Nbe a good sniper are the senses that#Nyou were born with. No amount of#Ntraining can change those.
texto_traduzido: As ferramentas mais importantes p/#Nser um bom sniper sao os sentidos#Ncom q nasceu. Nenhuma quantidade#Nde treinamento pode muda-los

texto: If your senses are dull from the#Nbeginning, you'll never be a great#Nsniper.
texto_traduzido: Se seus sentidos sao opacos desde#No inicio, nunca sera um grande#Nsniper

texto: {l"愨
According to the SWAT manual, the#Nlongest a shooter can stay adequately#Nfocused on his target is 15 minutes.
texto_traduzido: Segundo o manual SWAT, o maximo#Nque um sniper pode ficar adequadamente#Nfocado no alvo eh 15 mins

texto: After 15 minutes, the observer and #Nthe shooter change places. Sniping is#Nusually a two man job.
texto_traduzido: Apos 15 mins, o observador e o#Nsniper trocam de lugares. Atirar#Neh geralmente trabalho p/ dois

texto: zl"愨
It looks like your target is stationary. #NIf you've had enough practice, #Nit shouldn't be a difficult shot.
texto_traduzido: Parece q seu alvo ta p/do#NSe teve pratica suficiente, nao#Ndeveria ser um tiro dificil

texto: The scope of a sniper rifle is#Nextremely powerful. On the other#Nhand, it's got a very narrow field of#Nvision.
texto_traduzido: A mira de um rifle eh#Nextremamente poderosa. Por outro#Nlado, tem um campo de visao#Nmuito estreito

texto: If you're searching for your enemy's#Nposition, it'd be better to use your#Nbinoculars.
texto_traduzido: Se ta procurando a posicao do#Nseu inimigo, seria melhor usar#Nseus binoculos

texto: If you leave a lot of footprints, you can#Nconfuse your enemy. But don't let your#Nfootprints reveal the direction you#Nwent in.
texto_traduzido: Se deixar muitas pegadas, pode#Nconfundir seu inimigo. Mas nao deixe#Nsuas pegadas revelarem a direcao#Nque seguiu

texto: Disguise your footprints to fool the#Nenemy.
texto_traduzido: Disfarce suas pegadas p/ enganar#No inimigo

texto: Those mice are Alaskan field mice.#NDon't worry. They can't hurt you.
texto_traduzido: Esses ratos sao ratos Alasca#NNao se preocupe, eles sao inofencivos

texto: Wild field mice don't have a thick#Nlayer of fat, but they can still survive#Nthe bitter winters here without#Nhibernating.
texto_traduzido: Ratos selvagens nao tem#Numa camada grossa gordura, mas#Nainda conseguem sobreviver aos#Ninvernos rigorosos sem hibernar

texto: They dig tunnels under the snow and#Nthat's where they stay warm.
texto_traduzido: Escavam tuneis sob a neve e eh la#Nque se mantem aquecidos

texto: Survival specialists, huh? I should#Nlearn from them.
texto_traduzido: Expert em sobrevivencia?#NPreciso aprender com eles

texto: But there's a dark side too.#NSometimes the males will kill and eat#Noffspring that's not their own.
texto_traduzido: Mas ha um lado sombrio tbm#NAs vezes os machos matam e comem#Nfilhotes q nao sao seus

texto: To ensure the survival of their own#Ngenes, right?
texto_traduzido: Pra garantir sobrevivencia dos#Nproprios genes ne?

texto: Yeah.#NPretty brilliant program, huh?
texto_traduzido: Sim#NProgramacao bem inteligente, ne?

texto: If there are mice, that means there#Nmust be an exit somewhere. Follow#Nthe mice.
texto_traduzido: Se ha ratos, significa q deve#Nhaver uma saida em algum lugar#NSiga os ratos

texto: Snake, that floor is designed so that#Nyour footsteps echo.
texto_traduzido: Snake, esse chao foi projetado p/#Nque seus passos ecoem

texto: Listen, Snake. There's a way to walk#Nso that your footsteps won't be heard.#NI call it "stalking." Here's how you do#Nit.
texto_traduzido: Snake. Ha uma forma de andar#Nque os passos nao sao ouvidos#NEu chamo "perseguicao silenciosa"#NFaca assim:

texto: First, put your weight on the opposite#Nfoot that you're going to step with.#NThen take a step so that your heel#Nmakes contact with the ground first.
texto_traduzido: Primeiro, coloque seu peso no peh#Noposto ao q vai pisar. Entao de#Num passo p/ q seu calcanhar#Nfaca contato com o chao primeiro

texto: Then as you slowly lower the tip of#Nyour foot to the floor, gradually shift#Nyour weight onto that foot.
texto_traduzido: Entao enquanto abaixa devagar a#Nponta do peh no chao, gradualmente#Nmude seu peso p/ esse peh

texto: Use your knees to maintain the subtle#Nbalance. Try it.
texto_traduzido: Use seus joelhos p/ manter o#Nequilibrio sutil. Tente

texto: I...I can't do it...
texto_traduzido: Eu.. nao consigo..

texto: Another way is to wear your socks over#Nyour shoes...
texto_traduzido: Outra forma eh usar suas meias por#Ncima dos sapatos..

texto: If you crawl on your stomach, you won't#Nmake any noise either...
texto_traduzido: Se rastejar de barriga, tbm nao#Nfara barulho..

texto: The muzzle velocity of a bullet fired#Nfrom a revolver is slower than one#Nfired from an automatic. That's bad for#Nyou.
texto_traduzido: A bala do revolver sai mais lenta#Nque a da pistola#NIsto eh ruim pra vc

texto: The slower a gun's muzzle velocity,#Nthe more damage it does.
texto_traduzido: Quanto mais lenta velocidade#Nsaida arma, mais dano faz

texto: That's cause the bullet will tend to#Nlodge in the body instead of going#Nright through.
texto_traduzido: Eh pq a bala tende a se alojar#Nno corpo ao inves de atravessar

texto: Those kind of wounds take a long#Ntime to heal. Sometimes they never#Ndo. I think that's part of the reason he#Nlikes that gun.
texto_traduzido: Esse tipo de ferida demora muito#Npara cicatrizar. As vezes nunca#Ncicatrizam. Acho q por isso#Nque ele gosta dessa arma

texto: He's a real sick puppy, that Ocelot...
texto_traduzido: Eh um cara doente mesmo, esse Ocelot..

texto: The biggest drawback to a revolver is#Nthe reload time. That's your chance!
texto_traduzido: A maior desvantagem de um revolver#Neh o tempo de recarga. Eh sua chance!

texto: Meryl must be hiding somewhere in#Nthere. Search around.
texto_traduzido: A Meryl deve estar escondida por ai#NDa uma procurada

texto: It's true...your enemy is a powerful#Ntelepath. But you've got more battle#Nexperience. You can do it, Snake!
texto_traduzido: Eh verdade.. seu inimigo eh um telepata#Npoderoso. Mas vc tem mais experiencia#Nde batalha. vc consegue Snake!

texto: Snake, now's your chance. Take it.#NGet out of there!
texto_traduzido: Snake, eh sua chance. Aproveite#NSaia dai!

texto: Normally, when a soldier is taken#Nprisoner, he should only give up the#NBig 4.
texto_traduzido: Quando um soldado eh#Nfeito prisioneiro, ele so deve entregar#Nos 4 Grandes

texto: That's name, rank, serial number and#Ndate of birth. But you're not any old#Nsoldier, Snake.
texto_traduzido: Isso eh nome, patente, numero serie#Ne data nascimento.Mas vc nao eh#Nqualquer soldado, Snake

texto: I don't want you to tell them anything.#NFortunately, you're strong enough to#Nresist.
texto_traduzido: Nao quero q conte nada p/ eles#NFelizmente, vc eh forte o suficiente#Npara resistir

texto: ｪl"愨
Don't say anything to tease or anger#Nthe person torturing you. If you make#Nhim mad, it'll be that much worse for#Nyou. You'll need to save your strength.
texto_traduzido: Nao diga nada p/ provocar ou irritar#Na pessoa te torturando. Se deixa-lo#Nbravo, sera muito pior p/ vc#NVai precisar economizar suas forcas

texto: If you get a chance to eat, don't pass#Nit up. A prisoner can't be choosy.
texto_traduzido: Se tiver chance de comer, nao perca#NUM prisioneiro nao pode ser exigente

texto: You need to get your strength back#Nso you can escape when the#Nopportunity presents itself.
texto_traduzido: Precisa recuperar suas forcas p/#Npoder escapar quando a oportunidade#Nse apresentar

texto: Snake, you'll get a chance to escape.#NMake sure you take it.
texto_traduzido: Snake, vc tera chance escapar#NCertifique-se aproveita-la

texto: Master, I...
texto_traduzido: Mestre, eu..

texto: Don't say it, Snake. You still have a#Nmission to accomplish. That's all you#Nshould be concentrating on right now.
texto_traduzido: Nao diga, Snake. Ainda tem uma#Nmissao p/ cumprir. Eh tudo em q#Ndeveria se concentrar agora

texto: In any case, don't you think you should#Ncontact Colonel Campbell?
texto_traduzido: De qualquer forma, nao acha q#Ndeveria contatar o Cel. Campbell?

texto: be^V
Snake! What are you doing? Take#Ncare of the bad guys and get the hell#Nout of there!
texto_traduzido: Snake! O q ta fazendo? Cuide#Ndos bandidos e saia logo dai!

texto: You better use that weapon you found!
texto_traduzido: Eh melhor usar essa arma q encontrou

texto: Try to pick up an enemy's fallen#Nweapon!
texto_traduzido: Tente pegar a arma caida de#Num inimigo!

texto: ?e^V
Snake, Meryl's not herself. #NDon't use your weapon.
texto_traduzido: Snake, Meryl nao ta sendo ela mesma#NNao use sua arma

texto: It's Psycho Mantis. He's controlling#NMeryl. That tune is his mind control#Nmusic.
texto_traduzido: Eh o Psycho Mantis. Ele ta#Ncontrolando a Meryl#Na musica eh de controle mental

texto: Don't use your weapon. #NTry to knock her out.
texto_traduzido: Nao use sua arma#NTente nocautea-la

texto: _u!ó
That's Psycho Mantis...former KGB#Npsychic. He has powerful telepathic#Nabilities.
texto_traduzido: Eh Psycho Mantis.. ex-psiquico da KGB#NTem poderosas habilidades telepaticas

texto: After the collapse of the Soviet Union,#Nhe came to America looking for a job.#NHe worked with the FBI on several#Ncases as a psychic profiler.
texto_traduzido: Apos o colapso da Uniao Sovietica#Nveio p/ a America procurando emprego#NTrabalhou com o FBI em varios casos#Ncomo perfil psiquico

texto: Five years ago he was working on#Nthe case of a multiple serial murderer#N...and he got too far into the killer's#Nmind.
texto_traduzido: 5 anos atras estava trabalhando#Nno caso de um assassino em serie#Nmultiplo.. e entrou muito fundo na#Nmente do assassino

texto: As a result, he became just like the#Nkiller.
texto_traduzido: Como resultado, se tornou igual#Nao assassino

texto: So he was sort of infected by this#Nserial murderer's thoughts...?
texto_traduzido: Entao foi meio infectado pelos#Npensamentos assassino serie..?

texto: In any case, after that he became sort#Nof a psychic spy working for the#Nhighest bidder. He travelled all#Naround the world.
texto_traduzido: De qualquer jeito, depois disso se#Ntornou tipo um espiao psiquico#Ntrabalhando p/ quem pagasse mais#NViajou pelo mundo todo

texto: That's when he was recruited by#NFOX-HOUND.
texto_traduzido: Foi quando foi recrutado pela#NFOX-HOUND

texto: Zu!ó
He can read people's minds. He#Nknows every move that you're going to#Nmake.
texto_traduzido: Ele consegue ler mentes das pessoas#NSabe cada movimento q vc vai#Nfazer

texto: What should I do? I've got no chance#Nof beating him.
texto_traduzido: O q devo fazer? Nao tenho chance#Nde vence-lo

texto: There must be some way.
texto_traduzido: Deve haver alguma forma

texto: Uu!ó
He's a master at controlling people.#NSnake! Don't let him manipulate you!
texto_traduzido: Ele eh mestre em controlar pessoas#NSnake! Nao deixe ele te manipular!

texto: Not everything you see with your two#Neyes is real. Destroying his spirit is#Nmore important than destroying his#Nbody.
texto_traduzido: Nem tudo q ve com seus dois olhos#Neh real. Destruir seu espirito eh mais#Nimportante q destruir seu corpo

texto: Don't let him read you. Be a blank#Nslate! Okay? Clear your mind.
texto_traduzido: Nao deixe ele te ler. Seja uma folha#Nem branco! Limpe sua mente

texto: He read your mind with his psychic#Nabilities. Somehow you've got to get#Naround him!
texto_traduzido: Ele leu sua mente com habilidades#Npsiquicas. De alguma forma vc tem#Nque contorna-lo!

texto: I've got it. Use the Controller port!!
texto_traduzido: Entendi. Use a porta do Controle!!

texto: Plug your Controller into Controller#Nport 2. If you do that he won't be able#Nto read your mind!
texto_traduzido: Conecte seu Controle na porta 2#NSe fizer isso ele nao conseguira#Nler sua mente!

texto: Snake, is there some reason you can't#Nuse Controller port 2?
texto_traduzido: Snake, ha motivo pelo qual nao#Npode usar porta 2 Controle?

texto: Oh well, it's okay. Do you see#Nsomething that looks like a statue on#Nboth sides of the room?
texto_traduzido: Bem, tudo bem. Ve algo q parece#Numa estatua dos dois lados da sala?

texto: Yeah. You mean those things with#Ntheir faces all wrapped up in leather#Nbands?
texto_traduzido: Sim. Quer dizer aquelas coisas com#Nos rostos cobertos com faixas#Nde couro?

texto: Yes. Attack those statues to uncover#Ntheir faces.
texto_traduzido: Sim. Ataque essas estatuas p/#Ndescobrr seus rostos

texto: Why?
texto_traduzido: pq?

texto: ?u!ó
Those statues were modeled after#NMantis' real face.
texto_traduzido: Aquelas estatuas sao baseadas#Nno rosto do Mantis

texto: Mantis despises the sight of his own#Nface. If he suddenly sees his own#Ndisfigured face staring at him, it might#Nbreak his concentration.
texto_traduzido: Mantis despreza a visao do proprio#Nrosto. Se de repente vir seu proprio#Nrosto desfigurado olhando p/ ele#Npode quebrar sua concentracao

texto: Snake, if you destroy the faces of#Nthose statues, you should be able to#Ndisturb Mantis' psychic powers.
texto_traduzido: Snake, se destruir os rostos dessas#Nestatuas, deveria conseguir perturbar#Nos poderes psiquicos do Mantis

texto: He's using his psychic ability to read#Nyour Controller's moves. That's how#Nhe's evading your attack.
texto_traduzido: Ele ta lendo os comandos#Ndo controle com poder psiquico#Ne assim q ele desvia

texto: You've got to do something so he#Ncan't read your Controller's moves.#NThink! There must be some way!
texto_traduzido: Vc tem q fazer algo p/ ele#Nnao conseguir ler movimentos#Ndo Controle, Pense Deve haver uma forma

texto: Snake, isn't Meryl waiting for you?

texto: It's rude to keep a lady waiting.

texto: |e^V
Snake, Meryl's in danger! Find a#Nsniper rifle so you can shoot back at#NWolf! It's the only way to save Meryl!

texto: Snake!! What the hell!! Are you trying#Nto kill Meryl!!?

texto: Have you gone insane!?

texto: Snake, stop!!

texto: You're terrible, Snake!!

texto: <e^V
No!! I can't believe it!! Snake has#Ngone insane!

texto: Snake, you're a poor excuse for#Na man!...

texto: You got a PSG-1?#NYou can use that against Sniper Wolf.#NHurry up and save Meryl!
texto_traduzido: Conseguiu um PSG-1?#NPode usar contra Sniper Wolf#NSe apresse e salve a Meryl!

texto: Snake, be careful. They've set up#Nnew gun cameras and increased their#Npatrols. They don't want you to get#Naway.
texto_traduzido: Snake, cuidado. Instalaram novas#Ncameras armadas e aumentaram as#Npatrulhas. Nao querem q vc escape

texto: You can either destroy them with a#NGrenade or jam them with your Chaff...

texto: You won't be able to get on the#Nelevator unless you disable those gun#Ncameras.

texto: First you've got to retrieve your items.

texto: Select the bomb in the Equipment#NWindow and press the O button to#Nthrow it away!

texto: Here's how to rappel.

texto: Press the X button to jump away from#Nthe wall. While you're away from the#Nwall, press down on the Directional#NButton to drop down.

texto: If you jump while pressing right or left#Non the Directional Button, you can#Nmake a big jump in that direction.

texto: If you press and hold the O Button#Nwhile using the Directional Button,#Nyou can walk slowly across the wall.
texto_traduzido: Se apertar e segurar o Botao O#Nenquanto usa o Botao Direcional#Npode andar devagar pela parede

texto: If you're careful with the timing, you#Nshould be able to dodge the gunfire#Nfrom the Hind while you rappel down.#NIf anyone can do it, you can Snake!
texto_traduzido: Se for cuidadoso com o tempo, deveria#Nconseguir desviar dos tiros do Hind#Nenquanto desce de rapel. Se alguem#Nconsegue fazer, eh vc Snake!

texto: Liquid is still hovering around the roof of#Ntower B. He's waiting for you...

texto: Snake, it's time for you to take him on!

texto: X!Ê÷;
Colonel, listen to me.#NI found a parachute near#Nthe wreckage of the Hind.

texto: A parachute? You don't think that#NLiquid survived....?

texto: Impossible. As soon as he jumped out#Nof the pilot's seat, he'd be sliced up#Nfaster than an onion on an infomercial.

texto: ...So what's that parachute doing there#Nthen?
texto_traduzido: ..Entao o q esse p/quedas esta#Nfazendo la?

texto: Either that or a message...to me.

texto: ...Meaning "I'm not dead", I suppose...

texto: Well, in any case, don't let your guard#Ndown.
texto_traduzido: Bem, de qualquer forma, nao baixe#Na guarda

texto: I won't.

texto: The entrance to the underground#Nbase is further below.

texto: There should be a cargo elevator that#Nyou can take down somewhere around#Nthere. Try to find it.

texto: Snake, take that elevator all the way#Ndown to the underground base.

texto: It looks like that elevator you were#Nriding on won't go any further down.#NSwitch to the other elevator.

texto: Metal Gear is straight down.#NBetter move it!

texto: There's no time. #NThe terrorists are ready to launch.

texto: D!ﾊｮ#
Colonel, is there still something you're#Nhiding from me?

texto: Snake, please...just concentrate on#Nstopping them, okay?

texto: Snake, that water is contaminated with#Nnuclear waste material. If you go in#Nthere, you'll take damage.

texto: Her frequency is 141.52.

texto: KKF0
Snake, get that card key back from#Nthe rat. Why don't you watch its route#Nand set up a trap for it with the C4 or#Nsomething.
texto_traduzido: Snake, recupere essa chave#Ndo rato. Pq nao observa sua rota#Ne arma uma armadilha com C4 ou#Nalguma coisa

texto: Use your Mine Detector.

texto_traduzido: Sim. Detector Minas funciona#Nexatamente como detector metal#NA posicao chave deve aparecer#Nna tela radar

texto: Snake, they've input both detonation#Ncodes. The only way to stop the#Nlaunch now is to use the card key to#Nre-input the codes.
texto_traduzido: Snake, os dois codigos#Nforam inseridos. So da pra#Nparar usando a chave#Npra reinserir os codigos

Snake, re-input the PAL codes.

texto: Try using your Chaff.

texto: oe^V
Snake, we don't need a rat trap. We#Nneed someone to stop that godamn#Nnuke from getting launched!
texto_traduzido: Snake, nao precisamos de ratoeira#NPrecisamos alguem p/ parar essa#Nmaldita bomba de ser lancada!

texto: Snake, is killing rats really that fun?#NTorturing small animals is a sign of#Na warped mind, you know.
texto_traduzido: Snake, matar ratos eh #Ndivertido? Torturar animais pequenos#Neh sinal de mente perturbada, sabia

texto: Snake, it's gas! Hold your breath!

texto: Your O2 Gauge should appear#Nunderneath your Life Gauge. If you#Ndon't breathe, the gauge will#Ndecrease.

texto: Try to find a Gas Mask.

texto: au!ó
The gas that's being dispersed is#Nprobably an organic phosphorus-#Nbased nerve gas.
texto_traduzido: O gas sendo disperso eh#Nprovavelmente um gas nervoso a#Nbase de fosforo organico

texto: It destroys the nervous system by#Ninterfering with the breakdown of#Nacetylcholine, an important#Nneurotransmitter.
texto_traduzido: Destroi o sistema nervoso interferindo#Nna decomposicao da acetilcolina, um#Nneurotransmissor importante

texto: {u!ó
And you don't have to breathe it in for#Nit to kill you. It can enter your body#Nthrough skin contact as well.
texto_traduzido: E vc nao precisa respira-lo p/#Nele te matar. Pode entrar no seu corpo#Natraves de contato com a pele tbm

texto: Victims die within fifteen minutes of#Nthe onset of symptoms such as#Nnausea, perspiration, convulsions,#Nheadache, or difficulty with breathing.
texto_traduzido: Vitimas morrem dentro de 15 mins#Ndo inicio de sintomas como nausea#Ntranspiracao, convulsoes, dor de cabeca#Nou dificuldade p/ respirar

texto: Your Sneaking Suit will give you some#Nprotection. It's made of a material#Nsimilar to that which the NBC soldiers#Nuse.
texto_traduzido: Seu Traje de Infiltracao dara alguma#Nprotecao. Eh feito de material similar#Nao q soldados NBQ usam

texto: Also, I injected you with nanomachines#Nthat contain PAM (protopan chloride),#Na nerve gas neutralizing agent.
texto_traduzido: tbm te injetei com nanomaquinas#Nque contem PAM (cloreto de protopan)#Num agente neutralizador de gas nervoso

texto: ^盃ｱv
But that will only give you temporary#Nprotection. You'd better find a Gas#NMask!
texto_traduzido: Mas isso so dara protecao temporaria#Ne melhor encontrar uma Mascara de Gas!

texto: What have you got there?#NA cardboard box?
texto_traduzido: O q vc tem ai?#NUma caixa de papelao?

texto: #!ﾊr(
Yeah. Remember that trick?
texto_traduzido: Sim. Lembra desse truque?

texto: That's the Snake I remember. Those#Npoor fools won't know what hit em.
texto_traduzido: Eh o Snake q me lembro. Esses#Npobres tolos nao saberao o q os atingiu

texto: Are you smoking?

texto: Yeah, so what?

texto: Didn't you know that cigarettes#Ncontain benzopyrene, a chemical that#Nleads to lung cancer?
texto_traduzido: Nao sabia q cigarros contem#Nbenzopireno, um quimico q leva#Nao cancer de pulmao?

texto: nu!ó
We now know that when benzopyrene#Nenters the body, it changes to#Nbenzopyrene diolepoxide (BPDE)
texto_traduzido: Agora sabemos q quando benzopireno#Nentra no corpo se transforma em#Nbenzopireno diolepoxido-BPDE

texto: `u!ó
and attaches to the receptors on#Nthe P53 gene, the gene which#Ncauses lung cancer.
texto_traduzido: e se liga aos receptores no gene#NP53, o gene q causa cancer#Nde pulmao

texto: The BPDE attaches to the P53 gene#Nin three specific locations and causes#Npre-cancerous changes to the lung#Ntissue.
texto_traduzido: O BPDE se liga ao gene P53 em 3#Nlocais especificos e causa mudancas#Npreh-cancerosas no tecido pulmonar

texto: k!ÊYø
You know a lot about science, but you#Ndon't know how good a cigarette#Ntastes in the morning.

texto: <u!ó
The tranquilizer that Wolf is using is#Ndiazepam.

texto: Diazepam?
texto_traduzido: Diazepam?

texto: ¡u!ó
It's a benzodiazepam based anti-#Nanxiety drug. It has a strong effect on#Nthe central nervous system and it's#Noften used as a psychotropic drug.
texto_traduzido: Eh uma droga anti-ansiedade baseada#Nem benzodiazepam. Tem efeito#Nno sistema nervoso central e eh#Nfrequentemente usada como droga psicotropica

texto: So how does it stop your hands from#Ntrembling?
texto_traduzido: Entao como impede suas maos#Nde tremer?

texto: ~u!ó
Anti-anxiety drugs are also effective#Nas muscle relaxants. They're widely#Nused to treat psychosomatic disorders
texto_traduzido: Drogas anti-ansiedade tbm sao#Neficazes como relaxantes musculares#NUsadas em disturbios psicossomaticos

texto: du!ó
such as autonomic ataxia or as#Npre-anesthetics to relax patients#Nbefore an operation.
texto_traduzido: como ataxia autonomica ou como#Npreh-anestesicos relaxar pacientes#Nantes operacao

texto: But be careful. If diazepam is used in#Nlarge doses over a long period of#Ntime, it becomes addictive like#Nalcohol.
texto_traduzido: Mas cuidado. Se diazepam for usado#Nem grandes doses por um longo#Nperiodo, se torna viciante como alcool

texto: An adult should take no more than#None to four doses per day, with each#Ndose being .25 to .5 milligrams each.
texto_traduzido: Um adulto nao deve tomar mais q#Num a 4 doses por dia, com cada#Ndose sendo de .25 a .5 miligramas

texto: Jeez, you sound like a doctor.
texto_traduzido: Nossa, vc parece um medico

texto: I am a scientist.
texto_traduzido: Sou uma cientista

texto: Snake, look at your C-rations. They're#Nfrozen. You can't use frozen C-rats.
texto_traduzido: Snake olhe suas racoes-C Estao#Ncongeladas! Vc n pode usa-las congeladas!

texto: Until they defrost, you won't be able#Nto replenish your energy.#NBe very careful.

texto: They'll defrost in a warm place.#NProbably just your bare skin would be#Nfine.

texto: Snake, Naomi wants to talk to you.

texto: I'm monitoring you via the#Nnanomachines...Your body#Ntemperature is elevated and your#Nlymph nodes are slightly swollen.
texto_traduzido: Estou te monitorando via#Nnanomaquinas.. Sua temperatura#Ncorporal ta elevada e seus#Nganglios linfaticos estao inchados

texto: But don't worry, it appears to be just a#Nmild rhinovirus.

texto: I guess I got it from that soldier.

texto: If not, you'll just have to wait until your#Nbody's natural defenses take over.

Good, you've got yourself a weapon.#NTo use it, first hold down the R2#NButton to enter "Weapon Mode."

texto: That cannon he's holding is a 20#Nmillimeter Vulcan gun. You usually see#Nthem mounted on fighter planes.

texto: In any case, you'd better not try to#Nattack him from the front.

texto: Normal weapons are no match for his#N20 millimeter Vulcan. Try to attack him#Nfrom the sides or behind.

texto: You could also try to predict where#Nhe's gonna move and set up some#NC-4. If your timing is good, it might#Nwork.
